page.title: 19An Elderly Lady
page.content: She used to live in a terrace house opposite Brackendale Mill,but damp and the house being too big for her forced her to move to a bungalow near Thackley tunnel.She has been there for 5 years now. {************************************** {************************************** { {She said}I was born and raised up here in Thackley.I like it here because I am near most of my relatives and it's a clean quiet area.I chose to live in my bungalow because the neighbours are friendly and also it is handy for Basil (my dog) and me,because the woods are just nearby.I like to walk, it's very peaceful.I have enjoyed living here and I think I will die here. {**************************************
